transcript.text:
￼














B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan


Store Actions
Duplicate Store

1 min
there may be cases when the admin needs a new store but it is needs few different settings from another existing store in such cases, the admin need not to create a store from scratch with the duplicate store feature under the actions drop down, this can be accomplished for creating a new store with different settings, click on the actions dropdown of the selected existing store and then select duplicate store from the dropdown this will redirect you to the next screen where you duplicate the selected store select the features you want to copy from the selected store to your new store and then save the changes a new store with the selected details will be created and you will be redirected to its edit screen where you can manage other details
Did this page help you?
